channel.title: CVE Feed for Multiplayer Games -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Multiplayer Games -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-34644|2024-08-04T00:19:47.371Z -- multiplayer%20games -- multiplayer%20games
item.description: The Multiplayer Games WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] in the ~/multiplayergames.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 3.7.
